_aChangeLog.text: The truck is now impossible to enter in T spawn
Added crate to make it easier to get on the roof in T spawn
Added a bunch of bricks to make it easier to get on the roof in Outside
Added bags of cement in the corner of the second floor of Lobby
Moved boxes in A site closer to door
Added a bunch of boxes in the Ramp
Fixed navigation mesh for bots in ventilation
Footsteps on vents now make metallic sounds
Reduced duration of wind and air conditioner sounds

_sText:
Modification of de_nuke, which is based on CS:GO 2015 version of this map with some additions added by myself.Â 

The map is aimed at improving the gameplay of the map, but maintaining the CS:S atmosphere and aesthetics. Materials were used only from CS:S and HL2 assets. In addition to changes in geometry, the map has become lighter, HDR lighting has been smoothed out, ambient sounds have become quieter, bots now speak more accurate information about the position of the enemy.
